item.title: Magic Logic Buffer
item.description: (setq mlogb-enable-colors nil) → disable coloring (setq mlogb-enable-pretty-symbols nil) disable pretty symbols aus Add to mode-map: (with-eval-after-load ‘magic-logic-buffer (bind-key “<key>” #‘function magic-logic-buffer-map)) Add to list: (with-eval-after-load ‘magic-logic-buffer (add-to-list ‘mlogb-color-commands ‘(“color” . “r,g,b”))) mlogb-enable-delete-LaTeX-macros At first, you can do all these in a single ‘with-eval-after-load’ clause. Also, ‘add-to-list’ and ‘delete’ will add/remove only one color at a time, so you have to repeat them many times to add/remove all the colors you need.
